snippet: The European Union is increasing its aid to those affected by the civil war in Syria by 215 million euros ($280 million)....

headline.print_headline: EU Increases Syria Refugee Aid by $280 Million
headline.main: EU Increases Syria Refugee Aid by $280 Million

lead_paragraph: The European Union is increasing its aid to those affected by the civil war in Syria by 215 million euros ($280 million).
